verses.verse: To the chief <WH5329> Musician, <WH5329> A Psalm of David, <WH1732> to bring <WH2142> to remembrance. <WH2142> Make haste, O God, <WH430> to deliver <WH5337> me; make haste <WH2363> to help <WH5833> me, O LORD. <WH3068>

Let them be ashamed <WH954> and confounded <WH2659> that seek <WH1245> after my soul: <WH5315> let them be turned <WH5472> backward, <WH268> and put to confusion, <WH3637> that desire <WH2655> my hurt. <WH7451>
Let them be turned <WH7725> back <WH7725> for a reward <WH6118> of their shame <WH1322> that say, <WH559> Aha, <WH253> aha. <WH253>

Let all <WH3605> those that seek <WH1245> you rejoice <WH7797> and be glad <WH8056> in you: and let such as love <WH157> your salvation <WH3444> say <WH559> continually, <WH8548> Let God <WH430> be magnified. <WH1431>
But I am poor <WH6041> and needy: <WH34> make haste <WH2363> to me, O God: <WH430> you are my help <WH5828> and my deliverer; <WH6403> O LORD, <WH3068> make no <WH408> tarrying. <WH309>
